item.title: Quick Start
item.description: If you don’t want to think about anything but want to get a working blog, do this. This guide assumes that you already have installed the Hugo-extended version Make a folder that will contain the blog source code. (For example: c:\workspace\quickstartblog) Go to the folder directory you made in step 1(quickstartblog in my case), and create a new Hugo site by typing hugo new site . Keep in mind that there is a .

item.title: Installation
item.description: Step 1: Install Hugo This guide assumes that you already installed the Hugo-extended version. Step 2: Create a New Site Create a new site by typing this. It will create some empty folders. I’m going to make a myblog folder in this guide. hugo new site myblog Step 3: Add a Theme You can download and unpack the theme manually from Github but it’s easier to use git to clone the repo.
